sentences.en: I adore even the shadow of love; but I adore himself yet more.
sentences.cn: 我甚至崇拜爱情的影子, 但我更崇拜爱情本身.

sentences.en: I adore good books and the theatre.
sentences.cn: 我爱读好书，也喜欢看戏。
我非常喜欢这个小男孩.

sentences.en: I adore white chocolate, as it has such a sweet taste and I always feel very wicked when eating it.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢白巧克力，因为它的口味如此香甜，吃的时候总让我欲罢不能。
玛丽,我极喜欢你这身衣服.

sentences.en: I really adore him . He's so full of zap.
sentences.cn: 我真佩服他, 精力那麽充沛!
我简直太喜欢巧克力了。

sentences.en: I would adore to settle back homeland.
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢回家乡定居.

sentences.en: It's obvious that she adores him.
People adore him for his noble character.
sentences.cn: 人们因他的高贵品质而敬爱他.

sentences.en: People who adore the thrill of the chase know that prizes, like diamonds, are worth striving for.
sentences.cn: 享受追求过程中的刺激的人们清楚，奖赏和钻石一样，是值得为之一搏的。

sentences.en: She adored her parents and would do anything to please them.
sentences.cn: 她深爱她的父母，愿做任何事来让他们高兴。

sentences.en: She could not choose but adore him with all her heart.
sentences.cn: 她除了五体投地地崇拜他而外,还能怎么样呢.

sentences.en: We adore him for his integrity and brilliant diplomatic accomplishment.
sentences.cn: 我们因他的正直和辉煌的外交成就而敬重他.

sentences.en: We adore our sisters and brothers.
sentences.cn: 我们爱自己的兄弟姐妹.

sentences.en: We adore them for their generosity.

sentences.cn: 你将十分喜欢这部电影.

words.tran_cn: 可爱的；可敬重的，值得崇拜的
美妙地；可崇敬地；可爱地
崇拜;敬慕;热爱;敬重;爱慕

trans.tran_en: to love someone very much and feel very proud of them
If you adore someone, you feel great love and admiration for them
